size.description: Size of temporary storage in gigabytes. Must be between 10 and 16000.

type.description:
Type of writeable storage space for temporarily storing your savedown data. The valid values are:
* SDS01 - This type represents 3000 IOPS and io2 ebs volume type.

volumeName.description: The name of the kdb volume that you want to use as writeable save-down storage for clusters.
